text: Step 3 BEEH left right v v -~ @00000 A A i j def partition(nums, left, right): Ry i, j = left, right # Bl nums[left] NEEH while i < j: while i < j and nums[j] >= nums[left]l: # MARERENM FEERNTE j =1 while i < j and nums[i] <= nums[left]l: # MEBGRENIATFEERNTE i+=1 nums[il, nums[j] = nums[j], nums[i] # XN TR nums[i], nums[left] = nums[left], nums[i] # BEAEBRERNFRANS RE return i # BREEERIFRS| www.hello-algo. com
